refnamediv.refpurpose: Extrait des informations sur l'utilisation du cache opcode

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.examples; Un exemple de wincache_ocache_meminfo
&example.outputs; Array ( [memory_total] => 134217728 [memory_free] => 112106972 [num_used_blks] => 15469 [num_free_blks] => 4 [memory_overhead] => 247600 )
